sailpoint.object
Class Right

java.lang.Object
  sailpoint.object.Right
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, sailpoint.tools.xml.IXmlEqualable<Right>
public class Right
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable, sailpoint.tools.xml.IXmlEqualable<Right>

Part of the RightConfig model, a representation of a specific right on a target object. There will be a default set of these, but the model is extensible to accommodate resources that have unusual rights.

See Also:

getDisplayableName

public java.lang.String getDisplayableName(java.util.Locale locale)
Helper method to return a displayable name. This looks at both the name and display name and will attempt localization.
